Sections.Name: GeneralSettings
Sections.Description: Related To General Settings For The Mod

Keys.Name: ReverseCycleDirections
Keys.Description: Reverse What Direction Modes Cycle || Default = False

Keys.Name: AllowModeLooping
Keys.Description: Cycling Through All Modes Will Loop Back To First Or Final Modes || Default = True

Sections.Name: IgnoreModesSettings
Sections.Description: Related To Ignored Interaction Mode Options

Keys.Name: EnableIgnoreModes
Keys.Description: Allows Interaction Modes To Be Ignored/Skipped Over || Default = True

Keys.Name: IgnoreStealMode
Keys.Description: If Enabled, Steal Mode Will Be Ignored || Default = False

Keys.Name: IgnoreGrabMode
Keys.Description: If Enabled, Grab Mode Will Be Ignored || Default = False

Keys.Name: IgnoreInfoMode
Keys.Description: If Enabled, Info Mode Will Be Ignored || Default = False

Keys.Name: IgnoreTalkMode
Keys.Description: If Enabled, Talk Mode Will Be Ignored || Default = False

Sections.Name: MiscSettings
Sections.Description: Related To Misc Settings And Options

Keys.Name: EnableMouseWheelCycling
Keys.Description: Allows Use Of The Mouse-Wheel To Through Interaction Modes || Default = True

Keys.Name: EnableKeyPressCycling
Keys.Description: Allows Cycling Through Interaction Modes By Using The Keybind Below || Default = False

Keys.Name: CycleModesKey
Keys.Description: Keybind Used To Cycle Through Interaction Modes || Default = R
